Reviews.Title: “Definitely worth your money”
Reviews.Author: MManly
Reviews.Content: hotel business trip third time dissatisfied hotel nice clean free wifi ubahn close shops malls city center free private car parking remember buy environmental badge travel car breakfast hotel variety freshness 4star hotels restaurant hotel choose door

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel!”
Reviews.Author: kathiejmie
Reviews.Content: friend stayed hotel nights spacious clean staff helpful friendly hotel offers complimentary wifi breakfast absolutely fantastic hotel 23 minutes walk ubahn station doesnt centre city theres huge shopping center near ubahn station lots bars restaurants

Reviews.Title: “An ideal place to stay when visiting Berlin”
Reviews.Author: WilberEngland
Reviews.Content: proximity hotel transport links visit hoped 5 day break berlin hotel appeared 3 star rating terms service visited staff helpful pleasant buffet breakfasts excellent
